name: Dot Dump!
description:
In Dot Dump you need to clear blue dots off of a playing grid. Simple right?

This challenging game might surprise you with it's unique twist on the puzzle genre. Pre-plan, use your best logic, and all your smarts to work your way through game!
Main Features:

-Play and master three difficulties, all with unique game mechanics and grids!

-Unlock six grids that you can mix with your desired difficulty in the Custom Level Menu!

-Beat all the levels in a difficulty and win ribbons! (by the way the ribbons do literally nothing).

-Play through the interactive tutorial to get you playing quick.

-Easy to navigate UI, for minimum rage!
